0: recorded album of songs made famous by

--------------------
Text: Funky Junction were an Irish rock band formed in 1972 specifically to record a single album of songs made famous by British band Deep Purple, which was released as "Funky Junction Play a Tribute to Deep Purple" in January 1973.

--------------------
Text: Funky Junction:  Among the band's lineup were all three members of the early 1970s incarnation of Thin Lizzy.
